movies.title: Alone Against Rome
movies.plot: A Roman Consul, on his way to fight a border war, stations a garrison of soldiers in a provincial town. The townspeople aren't happy with this situation but decide it's in their best interests to cooperate. However, the Tribune left in charge of the garrison proves to be cruel and demanding. He takes over a house for his own use and forces his attentions on Fabiola, the owner's daughter. She reluctantly submits in order to protect the life of her lover, Brenno, who's already been publicly whipped and who's been hauled off to the local arena to provide sport for Roman gladiators. Soon, Brenno and Fabiola's brother are organizing a resistance which will put an end to the Tribune's reign of tyranny.
movies.simplePlot: A Roman Consul, on his way to fight a border war, stations a garrison of soldiers in a provincial town. The townspeople aren't happy with this situation but decide it's in their best ...

biography.bio: Lang Jeffries was born on June 7, 1930 in Ontario, Canada as Bill Lappin. He was an actor, known for Rescue 8 (1958), Mission Stardust (1967) and Requiem for a Gringo (1968). He was married to Rhonda Fleming. He died on February 12, 1987 in Huntington Beach, California, USA.
biography.name: Lang Jeffries

biography.bio: Rossana Podestà was born on August 20, 1934 in Zlitan, Misratah, Libya as Carla Podestà. She was an actress, known for 7 Hommes en or (1965), Helen of Troy (1956) and Horror Castle (1963). She was married to Marco Vicario. She died on December 10, 2013 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Rossana Podestà

biography.bio: Philippe Leroy was born on October 15, 1930 in Paris, France. He is an actor, known for Le Trou (1960), The Night Porter (1974) and La Femme Nikita (1990). He has been married to Silvia Tortora since September 1, 1990. They have two children.
biography.name: Philippe Leroy

biography.bio: Gabriele Tinti was born on August 22, 1932 in Molinella, Emilia-Romagna, Italy. He was an actor, known for The Flight of the Phoenix (1965), Rider on the Rain (1970) and Emanuelle and the Last Cannibals (1977). He was married to Laura Gemser and Norma Bengell. He died on November 12, 1991 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Gabriele Tinti

biography.bio: Luciana Angiolillo was born on December 22, 1925 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Luciana Nevi. She is an actress, known for Il Sorpasso (1962), Girl with a Suitcase (1961) and Camilla (1954). She has been married to Mario Tellini since January 14, 1959. She was previously married to Gaetano Angiolillo.
biography.name: Luciana Angiolillo

biography.bio: Renato Terra, formally Renato Caizi, was born in Naples to a poor family. He found a great interest in acting, and by hanging around Cinecitta in Rome he eventually found odd jobs in films, he then changed his professional acting name to Terra. His unfortunate event came at the peak of his career during the shooting of a western scene in which he fell from a horse and broke his nose, he was really upset as he was convinced that the accident disfigured his face and ruined the successful acting career he was hoping for, however that did not stop him from continuing to work with some of the Italian Cinematography's biggest stars like Toto' and director Franco Zeffirelli (Gesus of Nazareth). He continued acting till the mid 1970s when he retired so continue another great passion of his, Poetry, and even published a book called "Che Strano Paese".
biography.name: Renato Terra

biography.bio: Goffredo Unger was born on June 6, 1933 in Oslo, Norway. He was an actor and assistant director, known for Hercules Against the Moon Men (1964), On m'appelle King (1971) and Les géants de Rome (1964). He died in May 2009 in Italy.
biography.name: Goffredo Unger

biography.bio: Angelo Bastianoni is an actor, known for Alone Against Rome (1962) and Slave of Rome (1961).
biography.name: Angelo Bastianoni

biography.bio: Rinaldo Zamperla is known for his work on Cari fottutissimi amici (1994), Night of the Sharks (1988) and The Conqueror of Atlantis (1965).
biography.name: Rinaldo Zamperla

biography.bio: Djordje Nenadovic was born on July 27, 1935 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Winnetou: The Red Gentleman (1964), Strangler vs. Strangler (1984) and Wild Kurdistan (1965).
biography.name: Djordje Nenadovic

biography.bio: Giancarlo Bastianoni was born in 1940 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is known for his work on Crime Busters (1977), Watch Out, We're Mad (1974) and Le shérif et les extraterrestres (1979).
biography.name: Giancarlo Bastianoni

biography.bio: Alfredo Danesi is known for his work on Alone Against Rome (1962), L'avventuriero della Tortuga (1965) and Ben-Hur (1959).
biography.name: Alfredo Danesi

biography.bio: Franco Nonibasti is an actor, known for Alone Against Rome (1962).
biography.name: Franco Nonibasti

biography.bio: Janez Albreht was born on March 23, 1925 in Ljubljana, Slovenia. He was an actor, known for Idealist (1976), The Action (1960) and La danse sous la pluie (1961). He died on March 1, 2013 in Ljubljana.
biography.name: Janez Albreht
